--- layout: apidoc title: Tile5 API Documentation ---

T5.Renderer

Events

Renderers fire the following events:

detach

predraw

reset

applyStyle(style: T5.Style): string

applyTransform(drawable: T5.Drawable, offsetX: int, offsetY: int)

getDimensions()

getOffset()

getViewport()

hitTest(drawData, hitX, hitY): boolean

prepare(layers, state, tickCount, hitData)

projectXY(srcX, srcY)

This function is optionally implemented by a renderer to manually take care of projecting an x and y coordinate to the target drawing area.

render

reset()

T5.registerRenderer(id, creatorFn)

T5.attachRenderer(id, view, container, params)
